obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_119_0: * Welcome to EXTRA GAME! Tonight^1, our \O0^1 will be.../%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_125_0: * W-Wait just a moment!^1! I'm receiving an EMERGENCY BROADCAST.../%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_162_0: * Something MASSIVE has begun ASSAULTING the CITY!!!/
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_164_0: * At this rate..^1. everything..^1. EVERYONE will be destroyed!!!/
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_165_0: * Can anyone PLEASE tell me who this MONSTER IS!?/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_206_0: * That's right!!^1! It's a giant monster movie!!^1! Starring Susie!!!/
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_210_0: \EH* Aww^1! Susie^1, your costume is so adora..^1. umm^1, scary./
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_215_0: * RIGHT^1! \O2 will be our baddie smashing^1, hyper spinning star of the day!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_228_0: * Ms. Zilla!^1! You were watching the monster marathon until you fell asleep./
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_230_0: * I was so HAPPY to see someone so excited to tune in!!!/
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_233_0:
* So this final event's a
\O3 SERVICE just for you!!/
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_235_0: * And haha^1, by all means^1, please^1! Come over to Kris's and watch MORE TV ANYTIME!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_280_0: * You don't even have to come in^1! Stand outside and watch me through the window!/
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_282_0: * I won't tell anyone!^1! The police will never know!^1! Promise!^1! Hahaha!!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_315_0: \EK* Uhh..^1. so I do what. Kick your ass?/
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_317_0: * No. Uhh^1, no. \O2 had a change in her TV-loving heart./
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_318_0: * She may wreck the city^1, but she'll protect me^1, TV statue^1, with her life./
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_319_0: * For if the bad guys take me down..^1. There's no more TV!!!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_408_0: \EK* ..^1. Whatever. Let's just make the most of this^1, Kris./%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_377_0: * Haters of true entertainment are constantly trying to kill me!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_378_0: * Defeat them before they hit me and ruin my pristine sheen!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_379_0: * Susie's ok to get hit^1, but if I run out of "Popularity"^1, it's game over!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_380_0: * Kris and Ralsei control Susie via rope like an unwanted puppet./%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_381_0: * Spin the rope with ~1 to smash anything and everything./%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_382_0: * That's it^1! You'll learn the rest on the job..^1. Or else!/%
obj_ch3_GSC05_slash_Step_0_gml_434_0: * Now^1, all READY!? Tail on tight!? Taken your radioactive breath mints!?/%
